starters.title: Wing Basket
starters.subtitle: Traditional or Boneless Wings
starters.description: Seasoned and tossed in your choice of sauce.

starters.title: Burnt Ends
starters.description: Tender pieces of Texas Beef Brisket seared and caramelized with Sweet & Zesty® BBQ sauce. Served with Onion Strings, jalapeño pickled red onions, and spicy Hell-Fire Pickles.

starters.title: Chili Cheese Fries
starters.description: Famous Fries covered with Dave’s Award-Winning Chili, melted cheddar cheese, and jalapeños.

starters.title: Southside Rib Tips
starters.description: Memphis-Style dry-rubbed Rib Tips, jalapeño pickled red onions, spicy Hell-Fire Pickles, and our Southside BBQ sauce.

starters.title: Cheese Curds
starters.description: Cheese Curds with Dave’s Ranch & Sassy Sauce.

starters.title: Dave’s Sampler Platter
starters.description: Southside Rib Tips, Chicken Tenders, Sweetwater Catfish Fingers, Onion Strings, and Traditional or Boneless Wings tossed in your choice of sauce.

starters.title: Onion Strings
starters.description: Lightly breaded and flash-fried, served with remoulade sauce.

starters.title: BBQ Nachos
starters.description: Tortilla chips topped with cheddar cheese sauce, jalapeño, lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream, Dave’s Award-Winning Chili, and your choice of Texas Beef Brisket, Georgia Chopped Pork, or BBQ Pulled Chicken.

salads.title: Dave’s Sassy BBQ Salad
salads.description: Choice of Georgia Chopped Pork, Texas Beef Brisket, or Chicken (BBQ pulled, grilled, or crispy). Served with bacon, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, shoestring potatoes & honey BBQ dressing. Served with a Corn Bread Muffin (260 Cal.).

salads.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
salads.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with grilled chicken breast. Served with a Corn Bread Muffin (260 Cal.).

bowls.title: Dave’s BBQ Mac & Cheese Bowl
bowls.description: Mac & Cheese with corn, jalapeño, and topped with your choice of Georgia Chopped Pork, BBQ Pulled Chicken, or Texas Beef Brisket. Served with a Corn Bread Muffin (260 Cal.).

bowls.title: Cup of Soup or Chili with Side Salad
bowls.description: Cup of Soup OR Chili with Side Salad. Served with a Corn Bread Muffin (260 Cal.).

feasts.title: All-American BBQ Feast
feasts.description: A full slab of St. Louis-Style Spareribs, a whole Country-Roasted Chicken, choice of Texas Beef Brisket or Georgia Chopped Pork, Creamy Coleslaw, Famous Fries, Wilbur Beans, Sweet Corn, and Corn Bread Muffins. Served family-style for 4-6 people.

feasts.title: Feast For 2
feasts.description: Generous helpings of St. Louis-Style Spareribs, Country-Roasted Chicken, choice of Texas Beef Brisket or Georgia Chopped Pork, Creamy Coleslaw, Famous Fries, Wilbur Beans, Sweet Corn, and Corn Bread Muffins. Served family-style for 2-3 people.

feasts.title: Founder’s Feast
feasts.description: Georgia Chopped Pork, ¼ Country-Roasted or BBQ Chicken, 3 St. Louis-Style Spareribs, Sweet Corn, Wilbur Beans, Creamy Coleslaw, Famous Fries, and a Corn Bread Muffin.

ribs.title: St. Louis-Style Spareribs
ribs.description: Hand-rubbed with Dave’s secret blend of spices and pit-smoked for 3 - 4 hours over a smoldering hickory fire. Then slathered with Rich & Sassy® over an open flame to seal in the Famous flavor with a crispy caramelized coating.

ribs.title: Baby Back Ribs
ribs.description: Two slow-smoked options: Original style - Dave’s own rib rub and Sweet & Zesty® sauce or Memphis-Style - rubbed with a secret recipe of herbs and spices, hit with a vinegar mop and served naked.

ribs.title: St. Louis-N-Baby Combo
ribs.description: Create your own full slab. Pair any 2 of the following: 6 Bones St. Louis-Style Spareribs (930 Cal.), 1/2 slab Original Baby Backs (610 Cal.), 1/2 slab Memphis-Style Baby Backs (590 Cal.).

bakedPotatoes.title: Broccoli & Cheese
bakedPotatoes.description: Tender, fresh broccoli, cheddar cheese sauce, bacon, sour cream and whipped butter.

bakedPotatoes.title: BBQ
bakedPotatoes.description: Choose from: Georgia Chopped Pork, BBQ Pulled Chicken or Texas Beef Brisket with cheddar cheese, bacon, sour cream and whipped butter.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Georgia Chopped Pork
pitmasterFavorites.description: Smoked for up to 12 hours and chopped to order.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Texas Beef Brisket
pitmasterFavorites.description: Rubbed with Dave’s secret spices then slow-smoked over hickory until it’s juicy and tender.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Country-Roasted Chicken
pitmasterFavorites.description: Seasoned ½ chicken roasted & char-grilled to perfection.

pitmasterFavorites.title: BBQ Chicken
pitmasterFavorites.description: Seasoned ½ chicken flame-kissed and slathered with Rich & Sassy.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Southside Rib Tips
pitmasterFavorites.description: Memphis-Style dry-rubbed tips. Served with a side of jalapeño pickled red onions, spicy Hell-Fire Pickles & our Southside BBQ sauce.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Traditional or Boneless Wings
pitmasterFavorites.description: Seasoned and tossed in your choice of sauce.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Cedar Plank Salmon
pitmasterFavorites.description: Grilled, glazed & caramelized on a smoldering cedar plank.

pitmasterFavorites.title: Sweetwater Catfish Fingers
pitmasterFavorites.description: Lightly breaded with Cajun-seasoned cornmeal and flash-fried, served with rémoulade sauce.

combos.title: 2 Meat Combo
combos.description: Choose any two different meats from below.

combos.title: 3 Meat Combo
combos.description: Choose any three different meats from below.

combos.title: St. Louis Rib-N-Meat
combos.description: 4 bones of St. Louis-Style Spareribs and choice of 1 meat selection.

combos.title: Baby Back-N-Meat
combos.description: A ½ slab of baby backs and choice of 1 meat selection.

combos.title: Burnt Ends-N-Ribs
combos.description: Burnt Ends paired with 4 bones of St. Louis-Style Spareribs.

desserts.title: Chocolate Cookies & Cream Cake
desserts.description: Rich chocolate cake with cookies & cream filling.

desserts.title: Dave’s Famous Sundae
desserts.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with hot fudge or caramel.

desserts.title: Hot Fudge Brownie
desserts.description: Warm brownie with vanilla ice cream and hot fudge.

burgers.title: Dave’s Favorite
burgers.description: Slathered with Rich & Sassy® and topped with melted Monterey Jack cheese and bacon.

burgers.title: Devil’s Spit®
burgers.description: Devil’s Spit® BBQ sauce topped with melted pepper-Jack cheese, bacon, and spicy Hell-Fire Pickles.

burgers.title: Ultimate
burgers.description: Georgia Chopped Pork, bacon, sharp American cheese, and our signature Sweet & Zesty BBQ sauce.

sandwiches.title: Georgia Chopped Pork
sandwiches.description: Slow-smoked chopped pork topped with Rich & Sassy®.

sandwiches.title: BBQ Pulled Chicken
sandwiches.description: Roasted pulled chicken tossed in Rich & Sassy® and topped with melted Monterey Jack cheese.

sandwiches.title: The Manhandler
sandwiches.description: Choice of Texas Beef Brisket or Georgia Chopped Pork piled high with Hot Link Sausage and topped with spicy Hell-Fire Pickles.

sandwiches.title: Cajun Chicken
sandwiches.description: Grilled Cajun-seasoned chicken topped with pepper-Jack cheese, fried Onion Strings, & rémoulade sauce.

sandwiches.title: Hickory Chicken
sandwiches.description: Marinated grilled chicken breast topped with Monterey Jack cheese and bacon.

sandwiches.title: Grilled Chicken
sandwiches.description: Marinated grilled chicken breast grilled to perfection.
